channel.title: Xbox 360 Wireless mics
channel.description:
I think the wireless mics are worth buying, they are really good, and are much better than the wired mic's. The only thing is that they break relatively easy, which is a big problem.
My mic itself is working fine, but my charger has broken, don't know how really. Thats why i made this post, i was wondering if anybody knows where to buy a wireless mic charger, without buying it off ebay. Or if that xbox sell them as accessories or something like that ?
So would i be able to buy from a store, or will i have to buy it off ebay or a friend or something like that ?
Anyone else had a problem like this ?

the only plus i can see from having a wireless controller is if you sit far away from your console although there are ones with really long leads.

The mic plugs into your controller, you know.

not on a PS3
[/quote]

try quoting all of my post next time

item.title: Xbox 360 Wireless mics
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

K…

And no, the quality has never died down as the power went down, and the mic itself isn’t broken, it’s fine, it’s the charger that has broken, and i was asking if xbox sell them as accessories or any other place sells them, as i can’t find any.

item.title: Xbox 360 Wireless mics
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Uh no they’re not, you have to charge them and usually they loose sound quality dies down slightly as the battery dies. Plus the fact of you need to charge them or change their batteries too. Whereas wired controllers don’t get any of that :P, the only plus i can see from having a wireless controller is if you sit far away from your console although there are ones with really long leads.

Read full topic
